doc.field: ALUSUISSE SHARES SUSPENDED ON CAPITAL CUT NEWS

- Trading in shares of Schweizerische Aluminium AG, Alusuisse, [ALUZ.Z] was suspended on the Zurich stock exchange after today's announcement by the company that it would cut its share capital by 50 pct, the bourse said. The bourse said trading would resume again on Monday. Alusuisse bearer shares closed at 490 francs yesterday, registered shares at 170 francs and the participation certificates at 45.50.
